* Any software that installs and requires a [[device driver]] to function. Applications that use pre-installed device drivers can function without issues.<ref>[http://www.thinstall.com/sales/demo.php Thinstall product demos] (the first one)</ref>
* Any software that installs and requires a [[device driver]] to function. Applications that use pre-installed device drivers can function without issues.<ref>[http://www.thinstall.com/sales/demo.php Thinstall product demos] (the first one)</ref>
* Some software with [[copy protection]] based on [[hardware]]. ThinApp will virtualize some hardware properties such as harddrive serial numbers but applications that bind to things like ethernet MAC address or CPU-ID may not run when moved to another PC.
* Some software with [[copy protection]] based on [[hardware]]. ThinApp will virtualize some hardware properties such as harddrive serial numbers but applications that bind to things like ethernet MAC address or CPU-ID may not run when moved to another PC.
  +   +
==Future development==
  +
A new version of VMware ThinApp is expected in the first quater of 2010, with new features like support for [[Windows 7]] and the ability to open thinApp package files<ref>http://virtualfuture.info/2009/09/vmworld-2009-thinapp-upcoming-features/</ref>. A Beta version is expect in November/2009.<ref>http://virtualfuture.info/2009/09/vmworld-2009-thinapp-upcoming-features/</ref>
